subscribeDesc: Subscribe to receive notifications of my latest posts and unsubscribe at any time!
subscriptionSuccess: Subscription successful, thank you for subscribing!
authorDesc: Passionate full-stack developer, entrepreneur and open source project author, and involved in several successful startup projects. Passionate about sharing technical insights, travel tips and life lessons, now lives in Shanghai, China and is active on GitHub and Twitter.

features.title: Technical Articles
features.description: Covering a wide range of technical topics, from basics to advanced applications, with detailed tutorials and in-depth analysis.

faqs.question: What can you gain from this blog?
faqs.answer: In this blog, I will share technical insights, travel guides, and life reflections. The technical sharing mainly includes front-end technologies such as Next.js, React, and Node.js, focusing on building efficient, beautiful, and user-friendly web applications. Travel guides will include detailed itineraries both domestic and international.

faqs.question: Why did I create this blog?
faqs.answer: My passion for programming and technical sharing led me to create this blog. It is a platform where I can document my development journey, share coding tips, and provide in-depth guides. Through this blog, I hope to connect with developers, share valuable insights, and offer practical advice to help you improve your coding skills. I believe that technology can change the world and create a better future. I hope this blog serves as a source of inspiration and information for your programming journey.

faqs.question: What tools are used for development?
faqs.answer: Editor: Visual Studio Code, Version Control: Git & GitHub, Frameworks and Libraries: Next.js, React, Node.js, Tailwind CSS, Development Environment: Docker, Vercel
